author: nc1234
content: Geth is also throwing `invalid argument 1: illegal base64 data at input byte 0` when I am calling `engine_updatePayloadWithInclusionListV1`  so it looks like Geth is expecting base64 IL

author: terencechain
content: interesting, I never paid attention to this, I just use the same data from `engine_getInclusionListV1`, nice catch cc <@845691100072509460>
